p: The ratio of ILI to ICU SARI admissions varied from influenza epidemic to influenza epidemic confirming that the intensive care burden of influenza is not predictable from ILI trends [ 25]. Depending on the epidemic, 8–17 SARI admissions occurred per 1000 cases of ILI in primary care (or a ratio of 1.3–2.7 ICU SARI admissions per each actual observed ILI in the 0.7% national ILI sentinel coverage).
